privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Shahin AI, we are committed to protecting your privacy and data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide when using our platform, including contact details, organization information, and GRC-related data.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use information to provide our GRC services, improve our AI models, and communicate important updates about your compliance status.

sections.title: Data Protection
sections.content: Your data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We comply with PDPL and international data protection standards.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your data. Contact us at privacy@shahin-ai.com to exercise these rights.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: For privacy-related inquiries, contact our Data Protection Officer at: privacy@shahin-ai.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Shahin AI platform, you agree to these terms and conditions.

sections.title: Services
sections.content: Shahin AI provides AI-powered GRC platform services. Access is subject to subscription agreements and usage policies.

sections.title: Data Ownership
sections.content: You retain ownership of all data you upload to the platform. Shahin AI processes this data solely to provide our services.

sections.title: AI-Generated Content
sections.content: AI-generated recommendations are advisory in nature. Users are responsible for reviewing and implementing compliance decisions.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

sections.title: Modifications
sections.content: We may update these terms periodically. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on our platform.

sections.title: What Are Cookies
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to enhance functionality and user experience.

sections.title: How We Use Them
sections.content: We use cookies for authentication, preferences, and platform performance analytics.

sections.title: Types of Cookies
sections.content: Essential cookies for platform operation and analytical cookies for usage insights.

sections.title: Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can manage cookies through your browser settings or our cookie preference center.
